table.name: vtiger_entitylog
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_entitylog` ( `entitylogid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `entitylogname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `relatedto` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `user` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tabid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `finalstate` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_entitylogcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_entitylogcf` ( `entitylogid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`entitylogid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
